definition[0]: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
definition[1]: a tall water bird with very long legs
definition[2]: to look around or over something by stretching or leaning
example[0]: He craned his neck above the crowd to get a better view.
example[1]: The children craned forward to see what was happening.
definition[3]: a large tall machine that lifts things and moves them from one place to another, used especially on building sites and for unloading ships
